name: powerapps-pcf-multi-select-optionset-control
title: Choices (multi select option set) Power Apps component framework sample
shortDescription: This sample component demonstrates how to leverage the multi select option set type on properties of field components.
longDescription: This sample component demonstrates how to leverage the multi select option set type on properties of field components. By binding the code component's primary property to this type, users can create all new types of controls with choices column.

references.name: Create and build a code component
Best practices and guidance for code components created using Power Apps component framework
Implementing choices (multi select option set) component
